title: Amazing 3 BR, 2.5 BA single family house in the heart of Southie!
posting_body: ft. of living space, everything in this house is new.
The first floor consists of a large, light filled living room, huge kitchen, and deck.
The kitchen features new cabinets, granite countertops, a breakfast bar, and modern stainless steel appliances: a gas range, dishwasher, refrigerator, and a built-in wine fridge.
The second floor consists of 2 king-size bedrooms, an office space, and a full bath.
Both bedrooms have plenty of closet space and room for furniture.
The walkout lower level includes a 3rd large bedroom with a walk-in closet and a full bath, as well as a laundry room with brand new washer and dryer, and utility room for extra storage.
Trex decking and a brand new, huge fenced patio provide tons of outdoor space.
New systems throughout: New heating system, water heater, central air, ceiling fans in every room.
Prime location right in the heart of Southie, just steps to Lincoln, Loco, Capo, Stats, Fat Baby etc.
Easy access to buses, 5 minute walk to the beach and 10-minute walk to the Broadway T.
This isn't a condo - you get the whole house.
No upstairs or downstairs neighbors, no shared common spaces, etc.
